pages.text: The waterskin is from the coldsweat mod and full mechanics can be viewed on the wiki.  Craft the waterskin from two leather and a string, and use on a water source to fill.  A waterskin can be cooled or heated in an icebox or boiler.

You can rightclick with a waterskin to empty its contents onto yourself, or it can be held in the hotbar to give yourself a gradual heating or cooling effect, which slowly drains the temperature of the waterskin.  This effect can stack with multiple water skins.
